sentence.Network_en: Language: Khalkha Mongol is the official language. Turkic, Russian and Chinese are spoken.
sentence.Network_cn: 语言: 喀尔喀蒙古语为官方语言; 突厥语 、 俄语和汉语也使用.

means.word_mean: 1. the Mongol people living in the central and eastern parts of Outer Mongolia
2. the language of the Khalkha people that is the official language of the Mongolian People's Republic
